title: Amphiphilic engineering of MoS2–g–C3N4 nanocomposites into a mangrove-inspired cascade system for sustainable drinking water production
content:
Environ. Sci.: Nano, 2024, Advance Article
DOI: 10.1039/D4EN00633J, Paper
Sichen Liu, Haotian Wang, Yumeng Xiao, David G. Calatayud, Boyang Mao, Gaoqi Zhang, Chenhui Yang, Lidong Wang, Meng Li
Drinking water contamination and water shortages are seriously exacerbated by industrial wastewater discharge.
